metadata.title: CVE-2023-0662 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP 8.0.X before 8.0.28, 8.1.X before 8.1.16 and 8.2.X before 8.2.3,excessive number of parts in HTTP form upload can cause high resourceconsumption and excessive number of log entries. This can cause denial ofservice on the affected server by exhausting CPU resources or disk space.

criterions.comment: php7.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
